item.title: Sheila Jordan, Legendary Jazz Singer, Dies at 96
item.description: Sheila Jordan, whose cool and supple voice carried her name through decades of jazz recordings, performance and education, died Monday in New York, her family confirms to Variety. No cause of death wa
